mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Cotton Cloth, Commissioned by the Church of Central Africa Presbyterian to Commemorate 150 years Since the Arrival of David Livingstone in Malawi
Cotton Cloth, Commissioned by the Church of Central Africa Presbyterian to Commemorate 150 years Since the Arrival of David Livingstone in Malawi, 2009

mods:mods.mods:note: One of the creators is unidentified.
